overview: Craig Ralston is an experienced and qualified Investment Management Consultant, who has extensive knowledge in the areas of planning, risk management, investments, tax planning, retirement planning and portfolio management. Craig works with a wide range of clients including corporations, foundations, trusts, and high net worth individuals. Craig attended University of Colorado. Craig was previously associated with Smith Barney for 13 years, where he earned the title of Second Vice President. Craig, in collaboration with Ken Beach, established the Cascade Investment Group, Inc. Colorado Springs office in 1996. He is a 28-year resident of Colorado Springs, Colorado. In his leisure time, Craig enjoys golfing, hunting and gardening. Craig is active in his community, currently serving on the Boards of several non-profit organizations.
